text.text: Allosaurus was a large theropod from North America. It was most commonly found in the Morrison Formation. A massive apex predator, Allosaurus would've feared little than starvation and strong competition. The first specimens were discovered during the Bone Wars though, it was described in 1877.
Allosaurus was 12 meters from nose to tail. Allosaurus would've eaten anything it could get its jaws arround. Sauropods, pachycephalosaurus, nothing was safe apart from the largest of
